name: Beetle Brawl Demo
description:
WARNING -Sound might be loud. Didn't get around to balancing the sound.

Take control of the powerful, Construction Beetle. You must brawl the Pirate Beetle. Defeat it by maneuvering past its offenses or out ranging it with your long, incredible attacks. The right attack has a long start up but is very powerful, it might even score you a one hit KO! The HP Bar does not determine if the game is over, it only determines how much knockback you take. The less HP, the more knockback! The victor is determined by who is knocked off the stadium (Still not implemented lol).

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift + WASD - Dash (No dash if no direction input)

Space - Jump

Left Click - Left Attack, a weaker, fast attack.

Right Click - Right Attack, a powerful, slower attack.

Some Tips:

If you are knocked off stage and are high in the air, it's not over yet! Try to make a recovery by airdashing back onto the stage.

The Construction Beetle has a longer range than the Pirate Beetle, using it to your advantage is an effective strategy!

The Pirate Beetle cannot dash or jump! Use that weakness to make space between you and it when you take too much damage.
